name: Telegram Torrent Leecher
description: A Telegram Torrent (and youtube-dl) Leecher based on Pyrogram. Powered by @torrentleechgdrivesupport!

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: should be an integer. The BOT API ID of the Telegram Group, where the Leecher should work.

OWNER_ID.description: should be an integer. ID of owner of bot

UPLOAD_AS_DOC.description: True/False. If true all files will be uploaded as documents. Default is False.

EDIT_SLEEP_TIME_OUT.description: should be an integer. Number of seconds to wait before editing a message.

MAX_TIME_TO_WAIT_FOR_TORRENTS_TO_START.description: should be an integer. Number of seconds to wait before cancelling a torrent.

TG_OFFENSIVE_API.description: should be an URL accepting the FormParams {i}, {m}, and {t}

LEECH_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

GLEECH_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom gleech command like /sync@urgroupname and so on. Default is /sync

TELEGRAM_LEECH_COMMAND_G.description: Enter your custom tleech command like /tgsync@urgroupname and so on. Default is /tgsync

YTDL_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom ytdl command like ytdl@urgroupname and so on. Default is /ytdl.

PYTDL_COMMAND_G.description: Enter your custom pytdl command like ytpl@urgroupname and so on. Default is /ytpl.

CANCEL_COMMAND_G.description: Enter your custom cancel command like stop@urgroupname and so on. Default is /stop.

GET_SIZE_G.description: Enter your custom getsize command like getsize@urgroupname and so on. Default is /getsize.

RCLONE_CONFIG.description: Enter your copied text from rclone config. Compulsory for /sync as well as /tgsync command

DESTINATION_FOLDER.description: Enter your Cloud folder NAME(not IDðŸ˜…) in which you want to upload/store your files.

CUSTOM_FILE_NAME.description: fill with name u want to prefix the file name like ur channel usernameðŸ™Š, keep empty for do nothing, but add to ur config vars even without input.
